attributes.action: Give parents the choice to send their children into school or lockdown schools.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently if your child does not attend school parents gave fines of £60 a day per child. In cases were parents are seperated both parents are charged the fines.If they remain unpaid they can take you to court and you can even serve prison time. 
During the pandemic this is OUTRAGEOUS! 
Parents are forced to choose between the safety of their children and potential legal action. I call for parents to have the choice. For the fines to be suspended and remote learning to be provided during covid19
attributes.background:
Suspend the fines for those parents who choose to not send their children in to protect them and their family from covid19.
Have all schools provide remote learning for those who won't be attending during the pandemic. 
Or
Lockdown schools as before . Only open to key workers and special needs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
